description.description:
Generate Fury: 10
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Bash the enemy with your weapon, dealing {#values1} damage. After bashing enemies 4 times, your next Bash will Stun for 1.25 seconds, this increases to 2 seconds if using a Two-Handed weapon.
Damaging a Stunned enemy with Bash grants you 5% Base Life as Fortify. Double this amount when using a Two-Handed weapon.
Damaging a Stunned enemy with Bash generates an additional 3 Fury, or 4 Fury if using a Two-Handed weapon.
After Critically Striking 4 times with Bash using a Two-Handed weapon, your next Core or Weapon Mastery Skill will Overpower.

Generate Fury: 9
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Lunge forward and strike an enemy for {#values1} damage.
Lunging Strike deals x30% increased damage and Heals you for 2% Maximum Life when it damages a Healthy enemy.
Critical Strikes with Lunging Strike grant you Berserking for 1.5 seconds.
Lunging Strike also inflicts {#values1} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

Generate Fury: 4
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, dealing {#values1} damage with each pair of hits.
If Frenzy hits an enemy, its Attack Speed is increased by +20% for 3 seconds, up to +60%.
While Frenzy is granting +60% bonus Attack Speed, it also generates 2 additional Fury.
While Berserking, your other Skills gain +5% Attack Speed for each stack of Frenzy you have.
You gain 8% Damage Reduction for each stack of Frenzy you currently have.

Generate Fury: 9
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Flay the enemy, dealing {#values1} damage and inflicting {#values2} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.
Flay has a 10% chance to make the enemy Vulnerable for 2 seconds. Double this chance when using a Two-Handed weapon.
When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, they take x10% increased Bleeding damage from you for the next 3 seconds.
When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, you gain 3% Damage Reduction and 50 Thorns for 3 seconds. This stacks up to 4 times.
Gain x3% more Fury for 5 seconds for each enemy damaged by Hammer of the Ancients, stacking up to 10 times.
After Overpowering with Hammer of the Ancients, you deal x30% more damage for 2.5 seconds.
Hammer of the Ancients deals x1% additional damage for each point of Fury you had when using it.
Upheaval has a 20% chance to Stun all enemies it damages for 2.5 seconds.
If Upheaval damages at least 2 enemies, you gain Berserking for 2 seconds, increased to 3 seconds if it damages at least 4 enemies.
Dealing direct damage to an enemy with a Skill that is not Upheaval causes your next cast of Upheaval to deal x8% increased damage, stacking up to 10 times.
If Double Swing damages a Stunned or Knocked Down enemy, gain 15 Fury.
Casting Double Swing while Berserking grants 2 additional seconds of Berserking.
Hitting an enemy with both hits of Double Swing makes them Vulnerable for 1 second.
Lucky Hit: Your Core skills have up to a {#values1} chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.
Dealing direct damage with Rend extends the duration of Vulnerable on enemies by 2 seconds.
Rend deals x12% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.
Direct damage with Rend grants 4 Fury per enemy hit, up to a maximum of 20 Fury.

Fury Cost: {#} per second
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Rapidly attack surrounding enemies for {#values1} damage.
Gain 1 Fury each time Whirlwind deals direct damage to an enemy, or 3 Fury against Elite enemies.
While using a Slashing weapon, Whirlwind also inflicts 20% of its Base damage as Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.
After using Whirlwind for 2 seconds, Whirlwind deals x30% increased damage until it is cancelled.
Basic Skills generate x{#values1} more Fury when using Two-Handed weapons.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Taunt Nearby enemies and gain {#values1} Damage Reduction for 8 seconds.
While Challenging Shout is active, gain x20% bonus Maximum Life.
While Challenging Shout is active, gain Thorns equal to 50% of your Maximum Life.
While Challenging Shout is active, you gain 3 Fury each time you take damage.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Steel yourself, gaining a Barrier that absorbs {#values1} of your missing Life for 5 seconds.
Iron Skin's Barrier absorbs 5% more of your Maximum Life.
While Iron Skin is active, Heal for 10% of the Barrier's original amount as Life per second.
Iron Skin also grants 9% Base Life as Fortify. Double this amount if cast while below 50% Life.
Gain {#values1} Thorns. Also gain 20 Thorns for each 25 bonus Maximum Life you have.
Increase your Thorns by +{#values1}. When enemies hit you, they take an additional 1% of your Thorns as Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Smash the ground, dealing {#values1} damage and Stunning surrounding enemies for 3 seconds.
Increase Ground Stomp's duration by 1 second.
Ground Stomp generates 25 Fury.
Reduce the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 1 second for each enemy damaged by Ground Stomp.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Bellow a rallying cry, increasing your Movement Speed by +30% and Resource Generation by x{#values1} for 6 seconds, and Nearby allies for 3 seconds.
Rallying Cry grants you Unstoppable while active.
Rallying Cry grants you 10% Base Life as Fortify. While Rallying Cry is active, you gain an additional 2% Base Life as Fortify each time you take or deal direct damage.
Rallying Cry generates 25 Fury and grants you an additional x50% Resource Generation.
Gain x{#values1} additional Maximum Life.
Damage Reduction against Elites is increased by {#values1}.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Become Unstoppable and rush forward, pushing enemies with you then swinging through them for {#values1} damage and Knocking them Back.
Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain by Charge take 15% damage and are Stunned for 3 seconds.
Reduce Charge's Cooldown by 3 seconds if it Knocks Back an enemy into terrain.
Damaging enemies with Charge makes them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Bellow a mighty war cry, increasing your damage dealt by x{#values1} for 8 seconds, and Nearby allies for 4 seconds.
War Cry grants you Berserking for 4 seconds.
If at least 6 enemies are Nearby when you cast War Cry, your damage bonus is increased to x{#values1}.
War Cry grants you 28% Base Life as Fortify.
Your Shout Skill effect durations are increased by x{#values1}.
Your Shouts also Heal allies for {#values1} of their Maximum Life per second.
Your Shout Skills cause enemies to deal {#values1} less damage for 5 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Leap forward and then slam down, dealing {#values1} damage and Knocking Back surrounding enemies on impact.
If Leap doesn't damage any enemies, its Cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.
Enemies damaged by Leap are Slowed by 50% for 5 seconds.
If Leap damages at least one enemy, gain 40 Fury.

Charges: 2
Charge Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Throw a powerful kick that deals 18% damage and Knocks Back enemies in front of you. Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain take an additional 54% damage and are Stunned for 3 seconds.
Damaging enemies with Kick makes them Vulnerable for 4 seconds.
Kicked enemies deal 54% damage to enemies they collide with while being Knocked Back. Enemies damaged this way are Knocked Down for 2 seconds.
If Kick damages an enemy, it consumes all of your Fury and deals an additional 20% damage per 10 Fury spent. Kick no longer Knocks Back enemies.
Gain {#values1} Damage Reduction while Berserking.
While Berserking, Fury Generation is increased by x{#values1}.
When a Brawling Skill damages at least one enemy, gain Berserking for {#values1} seconds.
Movement Speed is increased by +{#values1}.
Reduce the duration of Control Impairing Effects by {#values1}.

Charges: 2
Charge Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Throw out a trio of chains that deal {#values1} damage and Pull In enemies.
Steel Grasp also makes enemies Vulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
Steel Grasp gains 1 additional Charge.
If Steel Grasp damages an enemy, gain Berserking for 2 seconds.
Each time you take direct damage gain {#values1} Base Life as Fortify.
While you have Fortify for over 50% of your Maximum Life, you deal x{#values1} increased damage.
Increase the Damage Reduction gained while you are Fortified by an additional {#values1}.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Attempt a killing strike, dealing {#values1} damage to enemies in front of you.
If this kills an enemy, its Cooldown is reset.
Death Blow deals x100% increased damage to Bosses.
If Death Blow damages at least one enemy, gain Berserking for 3 seconds.
If Death Blow damages at least one enemy, gain 20 Fury.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage to Close enemies and gain {#values2} Distant Damage Reduction.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage against Injured enemies.
Dealing direct damage with a Weapon Mastery skill causes your next Core Skill to make enemies Vulnerable for {#values1} seconds.
You have +{#values1} increased Critical Strike chance against Immobilized, Stunned, or Slowed enemies.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Skewer enemies in front of you, dealing 13% damage, then rip your weapon out, damaging enemies for their total Bleeding amount and removing all Bleeding damage from them.
Ripping your weapon out of enemies during Rupture causes an explosion that deals 30% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.
Hitting at least 1 enemy with Rupture Heals you for 15% of your Maximum Life.
Hitting enemies with Rupture increases your Attack Speed by +20% for 4 seconds.
Your Bleeding effects Slow enemies by {#values1}.
Your Bleeding effects deal x{#values1} increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Call upon 3 Ancients to aid you in battle for 6 seconds.
 Korlic leaps at enemies, dealing 104% damage and swings his weapons in a frenzy, dealing 39% damage per hit.
 Talic spins in a whirlwind rapidly attacking enemies for 65% damage.
 Madawc upheaves the ground, dealing 195% damage.
While Call of the Ancients is active, gain +10% bonus Attack Speed and x10% increased damage.

Each of the Ancients gains additional power:
Korlic: You gain 10 Fury each time Korlic damages an enemy with his Frenzy.
Talic: Enemies are Slowed by 50% for 1 second when damaged by his Whirlwind.
Madawc: 30% chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds when using his Upheaval.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Activate three times to attach chains to each of your weapons and perform an attack:
 First your Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon slams into the ground, dealing 60% damage and Stunning enemies for 2 seconds.
 Second your Two-Handed Slashing weapon swipes in front of you, dealing 20% damage and inflicting 120% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.
 Third your Dual Wield weapons swing around you, dealing 32.5% damage per hit.
Iron Maelstrom gains +10% increased Critical Strike Chance and deals x20% increased Critical Strike Damage
Dealing direct damage to an enemy after swapping weapons reduces Iron Maelstrom's Cooldown by 1 second.
Attack Speed is increased by +{#values1} while using One-Handed weapons.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Gain Berserking and Unstoppable for 5 seconds.  For the next 10 seconds, dealing direct damage with Basic Skills grants Berserking for 5 seconds.
While Wrath of the Berserker is active, gain +20% increased Movement Speed and increase Fury Generation by x30%.
While Wrath of the Berserker is active, every 50 Fury you spend increases Berserk's damage bonus by x25%.
Increase your Maximum Fury by {#values1}.
Heal for {#values1} of your Maximum Life for each 100 Fury spent.
Each time you swap weapons, gain {#values1} Fury.
Your Skills using Bludgeoning weapons deal x{#values1} increased damage if the enemy is Stunned or Vulnerable.
Your Overpowers deal x{#values1} increased damage when using a Two-Handed weapon.
While using Two-Handed weapons you deal x{#values1} increased Critical Strike Damage.
Lucky Hit: Skills using Bludgeoning weapons have up to a {#values1} chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds, or up to a {#values2} chance when using a Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon.
Increase Berserk's maximum duration by 5 seconds and increase its damage bonus by +{#values1}.

When causing an enemy to Bleed, you have a chance equal to your Critical Strike Chance to increase the Bleed amount by 100% of your Critical Strike Damage bonus.
Overpowering a Bleeding enemy creates an explosion that inflicts 11% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.
Core Skills deal x135% increased damage, but cost x100% more Fury.

Dealing direct damage with a Two-Handed Bludgeoning, Two-Handed Slashing, or Dual Wielded weapons grants x10% increased damage for 6 seconds.
While all three damage bonuses are active, you gain an additional x15% increased damage.
